channel.name: ABC Comedy AU
channel.title: Doctor Who: The Doctor, The Widow And The Wardrobe
channel.desc: On Christmas Eve 1941, the Doctor poses as a caretaker to give recently widowed Madge and her two children a truly magical Christmas, but things get out of hand when her son Cyril enters a snowy forest world full of dangers.

channel.name: ABC Comedy AU
channel.title: ER
channel.desc: Romano suffers a horrific life-threatening injury while the CDC probes a mysterious and deadly illness in the locked-down hospital. Meanwhile, newly-widowed Elizabeth returns to London as she ponders what to do with her life.
